Metadata.title: Sunghyun Sans — SF Pro Rounded for Everyone
Metadata.description: A rounded typeface supporting 9 weights across Latin, Cyrillic, Greek, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, and Chinese.

Hero.title:

Hero.subtitle: Sunghyun Sans
Hero.description: Sunghyun Sans is a rounded typeface supporting 9 weights across Latin, Cyrillic, Greek, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, and Chinese.

Preview.title: See it in context
Preview.description: Headlines and body copy — Sunghyun Sans adapts to every context.
Preview.latinOnlyNotice: {fontName} doesn't support this script — falls back to system-ui.
Preview.headlineText: Good design is as little design as possible.
Preview.bodyText: Typography is the craft of endowing human language with a durable visual form. It is the art of arranging type to make the written word readable, appealing, and accessible. Great typography disappears — the reader sees only the content, never the container.

OpenType.title: Typographic intelligence
OpenType.description: Built-in OpenType features for precise, professional typography.

Info.title: Technical specifications
Info.description: Everything you need to know about Sunghyun Sans.
Info.languagesValue: Latin, Cyrillic, Greek, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, Chinese
Info.basedOnValue: Inter (Rasmus Andersson), Pretendard (Kil Hyung-jin), Source Han Sans (Adobe), M PLUS 1p (Coji Morishita)

LicensePricing.title: Free and open source
LicensePricing.description: Sunghyun Sans is licensed under the SIL Open Font License 1.1. Use it freely in any project — personal or commercial, print or digital.
LicensePricing.priceDescription: No cost, no catch, no strings attached.
LicensePricing.perm1: Use in personal and commercial projects
LicensePricing.restrict1: Cannot sell font files on their own
LicensePricing.restrict3: Don't use the reserved font name for modified versions

FAQ.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.description: Common questions about using Sunghyun Sans.
FAQ.q1: Is it safe to use in client projects?
FAQ.a1: Yes. Sunghyun Sans is licensed under the SIL Open Font License 1.1, which permits use in any project — personal, commercial, print, or digital — at no cost.
FAQ.a2: Used Glyph 3 App and added rounded filters. Experimented with Claude to find the right radii.
FAQ.q3: Are you not concerned about copyright infringement from Apple?
FAQ.a3: No. Sunghyun Sans is built on top of open-source fonts (Inter, Pretendard, Source Han Sans, M PLUS 1p) and does not contain any proprietary Apple font data. The rounding is applied independently using Glyph 3.

CTA.heading: Start designing with Sunghyun Sans
CTA.description: Start designing with beautiful multilingual typography.

Labs.title: Compare glyph structures across typefaces
Labs.description: Visualize raw vector paths, control points, and rounding algorithms directly from font files.
